name: One Vision
description:
Overview: Inspired by a change in my own vision after a recent accident, One Vision is a game where player vision has a 'One Time Use'. Within each level the player must navigate using their other senses along with their brief period of vision in order to reach the end and collect the optional collectable.

This was a solo project with all Art and Code was created by myself, some audio elements were not created by me and their original creator is credited below:

Level End Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/Annyew/sounds/580116/

Collectable Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270303/

Jump Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/se2001/sounds/528568/

Wall Bump Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170141/
